> [waterrabbit](#comment_66_1LxkfGxtWhktAJ5WJ9ZnKxksTSH37qm8cC): Instead of changing directory tree, an easier way is to organize the hash sums of files into a database like file.

That `/<part_of_hash>/<part_of_hash>/<hash>` is more so you don't have thousands and thousands of files in a single directory.
>If nofish wants ZeroNet to reuse existing files, he will probably choose to search for hash sums 
Might be a better idea, no need to change the filenames / directory tree.
